data.title: About Summit Properties
data.meta_description: Learn more about Summit, including what we do, our staff, and our company history. Summit initiates, develops, holds, and expertly manages properties across various sectors and countries.
data.text:
Tomer Pomeranz

CEO

Tomer Pomeranz, our CEO, brings over 15 years of business management and capital markets experience to Summit.

Show more

Before joining us, he served as Chief Investment Officer at Scailex Corporation, an international investment company listed on NASDAQ and TASE. Tomer's expertise extends to financial advisory for both private and public companies, and he co-founded a private hedge fund, where he led strategic investments, acquisitions, equity financing, debt restructuring, and debt refinancing. He holds an MBA in finance from Tel Aviv University and a B.A. in Economics and Management from Ben Gurion University.

Denis Nezaj

COO

Denis Nezaj, our Chief Operating Officer leads and oversees the company's operational functions and strategic initiatives.

â

Show more

With a strong background in finance, accounting, and technology, he brings over five years of invaluable experience to his role. Before joining Summit, Denis served as the CFO at Kohan Retail Investment Group, where he provided exceptional leadership, direction, and management for their finance team. Prior to that, he served as a Tax Manager at a Public Accounting firm. He holds a Bachelor of Arts in Accounting & Finance from the University of Tirana and a Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Systems from Lehman College.

Itay Barlev

CFO

Itay Barlev, our CFO, joined Summit Properties in 2014 as a certified public accountant (CPA). His extensive background includes reporting, budgeting, real estate transactions, financing and refinancing, and internal control procedures.

Show more

Prior to his role at Summit, Itay served as the director of the Fishman Group in Berlin for eight years and gained experience as a financial advisor at KPMG for four years. He holds a B.A. in Economics & Accounting (CPA) and an M.A. in Legal Studies.

Maya Miteva

Head of Sales & Acquisitions

Maya Miteva, our Head of Sales & Acquisitions and CEO of Deutsche Real Estate AG, joined Summit in 2018. She has been instrumental in leading asset acquisitions and participating in M&A transactions.

Show more

In 2022, she was appointed as the CEO of Deutsche Real Estate AG, Summit Group's subsidiary in Germany. Maya's previous roles include serving as an M&A advisor at Lazard, co-founding Kuna (now Evercore), heading transactions at Arminius Group, being Managing Director and Head of Corporate Finance & Transactions at GAGFAH Group (now Vonovia), and acting as CFO at Centerscape Group.

Ori Levy

Head of Development

Ori Levy, our Head of Development. With a background as a Certified Public Accountant (CPA) and experience gained from prestigious big four accounting firms, Ori offers a unique perspective to our team. He has dedicated over five years to the world of real estate, where his expertise spans operations, in-depth analysis, acquisitions, and development.

â

Show more

Ori is at the forefront of our development projects, driving our efforts to unlock the potential of the USA's real estate market. His journey reflects a commitment to excellence and innovation, making him an invaluable part of our team. He holds a B.A. focused on Accounting and Business Management (CPA) from Reichman University (IDC).

Gil Zochovizky

Head of Strategy and Analytics

Gil Zochovizky, our Head of Strategy and Analytics, boasts over 20 years of experience in finance and legal fields.

Show more

Gil's extensive knowledge spans real estate, business strategy, M&A, valuations, modeling, and FP&A. Gil's expertise also includes building and managing cross-company processes. He holds an ADV with an MBA in finance (Summa Cum Laude) and an LLM in commercial law (Cum Laude). His leadership and wealth of experience make him a pivotal member of our team.
